visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a bubble chart with the following specifications: Chart type: bubble, Chart title: 'Highcharts draggable bubbles demo', Axes and labels styling: Use a dark background with white text for titles and labels, Data series: Include a single series with the name 'Bubble Data' and data points [100, 240, 3], [200, 130, 10], [450, 290, 15], Custom colors: Use a gradient from blue to green for the bubbles, Additional configurations: Disable animations, enable draggable points for both X and Y axes, and set the Y-axis to have a soft minimum of 0 and a soft maximum of 350.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a bubble chart with a dark background and white text for titles and labels. The chart type is set to 'bubble', and the title is 'Highcharts draggable bubbles demo'. The data series includes a single series named 'Bubble Data' with three data points. The bubbles are colored using a gradient from blue to green. Additional configurations include disabling animations, enabling draggable points for both X and Y axes, and setting the Y-axis to have a soft minimum of 0 and a soft maximum of 350. This setup ensures a visually appealing and interactive chart that meets the specified requirements.
